nodes.bodyText: Should any impl packages be exported?
They shouldn't be, but unfortunately we have to export this one, since it's used in the xsa-multiapps-controller project (see CredentialStoreConfigurationEntryQueryImpl).
Why is the core changelog deleted? Was it used somewhere?

Because the Liquibase changes from the core module were moved to the persistence module. Now they're all in one place. Finally! \o/
Also, see the bean above this one. There's still a SpringLiquibase bean.
